languages.text: {n}Голос Джай звучит тяжело и весомо, она осторожно выбирает слова:{/n} "Не исключено, что по итогу этого собрания я окажусь... обременена некоторыми узами с Пощадой. И это зависит не от моей воли. Вряд ли он заставит меня покинуть твою свиту, но он захочет моей верности. Захочет владеть мной... во всех смыслах. И его вряд ли устроит перспектива делить меня с тобой. Я не знаю, важны ли для тебя наши чувства, но было бы подло с моей стороны не предупредить тебя".

{n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

languages.text: {n}婕伊以非常庄重的语气，说出了她仔细斟酌过的话。{/n}“我没办法排除这样的可能性：这次会议结束之后，我可能会被……我与悯慈的过去所累。这并不是我能左右的事情。他或许并不会强迫我离开你身边，但他恐怕会强迫我效忠于他。他会想要控制我……控制我人生的各个方面。而且，他根本不会与你分享我。你我之间，我们的关系对你而言是否重要，我并不清楚，但如果我不警告你这些事情，那我就太懦弱了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊以非常庄重的语气，说出了她仔细斟酌过的话。{/n}“我没办法排除这样的可能性：这次会议结束之后，我可能会被……我与悯慈的过去所累。这并不是我能左右的事情。他或许并不会强迫我离开你身边，但他恐怕会强迫我效忠于他。他会想要控制我……控制我人生的各个方面。而且，他根本不会与你分享我。你我之间，我们的关系对你而言是否重要，我并不清楚，但如果我不警告你这些事情，那我就太懦弱了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは、慎重に選んだ次の言葉を、重々しく口にする{/n}「この会合が終わった時に、あたしがマーシーに縛り付けられる可能性は…完全には否定できない。それはあたしの選択権はないんだ。彼があたしをあんたの従者から追い出すことはないだろうけど、あたしの忠誠を期待はするでしょうね。あらゆる意味において、彼はあたしを支配しようとするでしょう。そして、彼はあたしのことをあんたと分かち合おうとは思わないと思う。あんたとあたしの関係、それがあんたにとって重要かどうかは分からないけど、言っておかないのはずるいと思ってさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは、慎重に選んだ次の言葉を、重々しく口にする{/n}「この会合が終わった時に、あたしがマーシーに縛り付けられる可能性は…完全には否定できない。それはあたしの選択権はないんだ。彼があたしをあんたの従者から追い出すことはないだろうけど、あたしの忠誠を期待はするでしょうね。あらゆる意味において、彼はあたしを支配しようとするでしょう。そして、彼はあたしのことをあんたと分かち合おうとは思わないと思う。あんたとあたしの関係、それがあんたにとって重要かどうかは分からないけど、言っておかないのはずるいと思ってさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae continúa en tono solemne, eligiendo cuidadosamente sus palabras:{/n} «No puedo descartar la posibilidad de que al final de la reunión... recaigan sobre mí ciertos lazos con Mercy. No será decisión mía. Dudo que me obligue a dejar su séquito, pero esperará mi lealtad. Querrá controlarme... en todos los sentidos. Y no le gustará la idea de compartirme con usted. No sé si le importa algo nuestra relación, pero sería una cobarde si no le avisara».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae continúa en tono solemne, eligiendo cuidadosamente sus palabras:{/n} «No puedo descartar la posibilidad de que al final de la reunión... recaigan sobre mí ciertos lazos con Mercy. No será decisión mía. Dudo que me obligue a dejar su séquito, pero esperará mi lealtad. Querrá controlarme... en todos los sentidos. Y no le gustará la idea de compartirme con usted. No sé si le importa algo nuestra relación, pero sería una cobarde si no le avisara».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae choisit ses mots avec soin et les prononce sur un ton grave :{/n} « Je ne peux pas exclure la possibilité qu'au terme de cette rencontre, je me retrouve... liée d'une manière ou d'une autre à Mercy. Et ce ne sera pas de mon plein gré. Il ne m'obligera sans doute pas à quitter votre entourage, mais il exigera ma loyauté. Il voudra me contrôler... dans tous les sens du terme, et il n'appréciera pas l'idée de me partager avec vous. Vous et moi, notre relation, je ne sais pas si elle est importante à vos yeux, mais ce serait lâche de ma part de ne pas vous prévenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae choisit ses mots avec soin et les prononce sur un ton grave :{/n} « Je ne peux pas exclure la possibilité qu'au terme de cette rencontre, je me retrouve... liée d'une manière ou d'une autre à Mercy. Et ce ne sera pas de mon plein gré. Il ne m'obligera sans doute pas à quitter votre entourage, mais il exigera ma loyauté. Il voudra me contrôler... dans tous les sens du terme, et il n'appréciera pas l'idée de me partager avec vous. Vous et moi, notre relation, je ne sais pas si elle est importante à vos yeux, mais ce serait lâche de ma part de ne pas vous prévenir. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae wägt ihre nächsten Worte sorgfältig ab und spricht mit großer Ernsthaftigkeit:{/n} "Ich kann nicht ausschließen, dass ich nach dem Treffen ... gewisse Verbindungen zu Mercy zulassen muss. Und ich werde nicht diejenige sein, die das entscheidet. Ich bezweifle, dass er mich zwingen wird, Euer Gefolge zu verlassen, aber er wird sich meine Loyalität einfordern. Er wird mich kontrollieren wollen ... und zwar in jeder Hinsicht. Und ihm wird der Gedanke missfallen, mich mit Euch zu teilen. Ihr und ich, unsere Beziehung, ich weiß nicht, wie wichtig sie für Euch ist, aber es wäre feige von mir, Euch nicht zu warnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae wägt ihre nächsten Worte sorgfältig ab und spricht mit großer Ernsthaftigkeit:{/n} "Ich kann nicht ausschließen, dass ich nach dem Treffen ... gewisse Verbindungen zu Mercy zulassen muss. Und ich werde nicht diejenige sein, die das entscheidet. Ich bezweifle, dass er mich zwingen wird, Euer Gefolge zu verlassen, aber er wird sich meine Loyalität einfordern. Er wird mich kontrollieren wollen ... und zwar in jeder Hinsicht. Und ihm wird der Gedanke missfallen, mich mit Euch zu teilen. Ihr und ich, unsere Beziehung, ich weiß nicht, wie wichtig sie für Euch ist, aber es wäre feige von mir, Euch nicht zu warnen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, söylemek üzere olduğu sözcükleri dikkatle seçip ağır bir ciddiyetle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu toplantının sonunda Merhamet'le ilgili üzerime bazı... Yüklerin yüklenme ihtimalini yok sayamam. Bu seçim bana ait olmayacak. Beni senin maiyetinden ayrılmaya zorlayacağını sanmam ama sadakatimi talep edecektir. Beni kontrol etmek isteyecektir. Her anlamda. Bir de beni seninle paylaşma düşüncesinden hoşlanmayacaktır. Sen ve ben, ilişkimiz... Bilmiyorum bunlar senin için önemli mi ama seni bunlardan haberdar etmemek dürüstçe olmazdı."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae speaks her next, carefully chosen, words with heavy solemnity:{/n} "I can't rule out the possibility that at the end of this meeting I will be... burdened with certain ties to Mercy. It will not be of my choosing. I doubt he'll force me to leave your retinue, but he will expect my loyalty. He will want to control me... in every sense. And he won't like the thought of sharing me with you. You and I, our relationship, I don't know if it matters to you, but it would be craven of me not to warn you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae söylemek üzere olduğu sözcükleri dikkatle seçiyor ve ağır bir ciddiyetle konuşuyor:{/n} "Bu toplantının sonunda Merhamet'le ilgili üzerime bazı... Yüklerin yüklenme ihtimalini yok sayamam. Bu seçim bana ait olmayacak. Beni senin maiyetinden ayrılmaya zorlayacağından şüpheliyim ama sadakatimi talep edecektir. Beni kontrol etmek isteyecektir. Her anlamda. Ve beni seninle paylaşma düşüncesinden hoşlanmayacaktır. Sen ve ben, bizim ilişkimiz, bilmiyorum bunlar senin için önemli mi ama seni bunlardan haberdar etmemek dürüstçe olmazdı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
